about

my name is james henry and i am 21 years old. i have completed my education in diploma in advertising and graphic design at the one academy, malaysia.

i am strong with my wide range of creative solutions, multiple softwares, and, of course, in the ideation process. mainly, i focus in branding, packaging, and ui/ux. additionally, i am strong in video editing, photography, and motion graphics.

i have numerous freelance in the past working with various companies such as packaging designer for savis tea indonesia, brand designer for ideadventure indonesia, and graphic designer for bookXcess / big bad wolf, malaysia.

i have lead teams in the past, adaptive, creative, and curiosity-driven. i am open to criticism and new things.
